name: Residue (itch)
description:
Here it is, my first ever Bitsy story created for the Sea Folk #bitsyjam (Feb 2021). 

Take a stroll through this strange seaside town where the residents are remnants from another time and place...

Made with:

Bitsy by Adam Le Doux

Pixsy by Ruin

Sound of the Cornish coves via Freesound.
